attributes.action: To check on an unfair prison sentance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 2/7/07 my 77 year old father in law was sent to jail for 3 months for taking a speeding fine for his son.
He with his son were charged with perverting justice and jailed,my father in law has also been ill for the past year.
On the 13/7/07 a company boss charged with the same offence,the same court and the same judge Walked Free.
My family and myself do not condone what my father in law did,but how can this be justice when one man gets jailed and another person can walk free and also  the government are letting prisoners out to make room for serious offenders,yet this judge send's a 77 year old ill pensioner to jail for what I think is a "minor"offence when you consider other serious offences that is going on in this country today.
I petition the Prime Minister to help get this Man released

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
